name: BitcoinMarketUSD
0:
”Alexa, ask Bitcoin Market what is the price of a Bitcoin?”
”Alexa, ask Bitcoin Market how much is a Bitcoin”
skdetail:

Invocation Name: bitcoin market
des: Gets the current price of Bitcoin in USD. Pricing information is provided by coindesk.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
